amendment.description: Amendment allows juvenile justice grants to be made to religious organizations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 29 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to allow governmental entities that make grants to nongovernmental entities to also make grants or enter into contracts with religious organizations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Souder amendment (A027) Agreed to by recorded vote: 346 - 83 (Roll no. 222).
